dcterms:creator: A. S. Laboratories
dcterms:description: The Bristol Egocentric Object Interactions Dataset (BEOID) consists of egocentric video sequences collected from multiple users performing various tasks in different environments, aimed at discovering task-relevant objects and their interactions.
dcterms:title: Bristol Egocentric Object Interactions Dataset (BEOID)

dcterms:creator: D. Damen
T. Leelasawassuk
O. Haines
A. Calway
W. Mayol-Cuevas
dcterms:description: The dataset used in the experiments is not specifically named but refers to the collection of egocentric video data used to discover task-relevant objects and their modes of interaction.
